subject: Doping (Sports)
Commonwealth Games
lead_paragraph: Amantle Montsho of Botswana, a former 400-meter world champion, was barred for two years after she tested positive for a stimulant at last year’s Commonwealth Games.
snippet: Amantle Montsho of Botswana, a former 400-meter world champion, was barred for two years after she tested positive for a stimulant at last year’s Commonwealth Games.
